argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | taylfval.s | |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) |
| 2 |  | taylfval.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) |
| 3 |  | taylfval.a | |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) |
| 4 |  | taylfval.n | |- ( ph -> ( N e. NN0 \/ N = +oo ) ) |
| 5 |  | taylfval.b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) ) -> B e. dom ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 8 |  | #P_ringcmn | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cnfldtps | |- CCfld e. TopSp |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) -> CCfld e. TopSp ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( 0 [,] N ) e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_inex1 | |- ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) -> ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) e. _V ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_taylfvallem1 | |- ( ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) /\ k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) ) -> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) ) = ( k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) -> ( k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) ) : ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) --> CC ) |
| 18 | 6, 9, 11, 14, 17 | #P_tsmscl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) -> ( CCfld tsums ( k e. ( ( 0 [,] N ) i^i ZZ ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) ) ) C_ CC ) |
